summary: Email chain from October 2020 between legal personnel discussing scheduling a discovery call regarding the Maxwell/Epstein case. The sender is coordinating with a former investigator, now a legal instructor, to have AUSAs ask questions to ensure no lingering case information remains before discovery deadlines.

connections.description: I is reaching out to M to schedule a discovery call, indicating they have previously worked together or been in contact regarding the Epstein investigations.
M is being asked to participate in a call with AUSAs (Assistant United States Attorneys) to provide information on the Epstein case.

events.title: Approaching discovery deadlines in Maxwell/Epstein case
events.description: Legal team is coordinating a call to ensure all case information is accounted for before discovery deadlines.

keyFacts: The email discusses scheduling a discovery call for the ongoing Maxwell/Epstein case as deadlines approach.
M, a former investigator on the Epstein case, is now a legal instructor at an academy.
The purpose of the call is for AUSAs to ask questions and ensure no lingering case information remains.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal activity and information coordination in late 2020 regarding the case.
